attributes.action: hold an obligatory referendum on the issue of any petition received by the British government that is undersigned by 1,000,000 or more citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Holding referendums initiated by the delivery of petitions undersigned by a sizable proportion of the British electorate would hopefully help to dispel the current culture of political apathy, and lead Britain to becoming more of a participative democracy.
